altername_name: Shin Rorona no Atelier: Hajimari no Monogatari
name: New Atelier Rorona: The Alchemist of Arland
overview: Follow chibi Rorona- a world famous alchemist from Arland to improve her alchemy skills and defeat all the scary monsters with her friends, this time, with the new redesigned system, players will be able to use grid for measuring the attack range and come up with better tactics in the battlefield. As well, new features like "Auto Battle Mode" and "Back Attack Mode" will also be seen in this installment; gamers will be granted the capabilities to make one ally automatically fight one certain foe as well as gaining players' advantage by hitting the foe's back. Besides, more playable characters and new costumes as well as accessories will also be introduced to this remake title; featured new costumes and accessories include bikinis, nurse uniform, various garments, and even adorable puni hood! As well, adding Atelier Astrid Mode, players will be able to enter into the earlier life period of Astrid and Sterk when certain conditions fulfilled.
